row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_ARTIFACT.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
row.description: Set the execution environment for artifact transfer tool

row.Docu: This include is used to prepare the execution environment for the nexus action.It changes the current directory to agents bin directory and where it attaches the nexus jar to the current environment.This environment setting is used to run the java command for the action. It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment

row.process:
! Setting execution environment ! Print Header :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PRV.STORE.ARTIFACT_TRANSFER" ,"ARTIFACT_TRANSFER_TOOL", C, N
! Setting jar class path into variable :SET &UC4RB_PATH_JAR#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"artifact-transfer-tool.jar")
